title: "Man I can't wait to play jungle Fiddlesticks in teambuilder today!"

replies.body: I see people complain about this all the time, but I've never been kicked from Team Builder, and I generally don't even need to wait very long to get in O.o
I don't wait long or get kicked when I play off-meta either. Figured that was implied.
you're friends won't kick you either.

your*
and I don't play team builder with friends.

I'd be friends with him.

Because he seems a lot more friendly than you...
Thanks ;) hahaha
Great, I think he's going to start following us in the boards. -_-

Hahaha noooooo
Deleting my account.

And I'm a loser, why?

You're the one with the bad attitude, here. This guy and I have winning attitudes.
[Do you have nothing better to do?](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/tips-tricks/9OvXH33c-learning-vi-any-tips?comment=00020000)
you came here talking to me and im the one with nothing better to do? riiiight

XD
Glad to see you have a mind full of intelligence.
Enjoy your lengthy wait times, sweetie.

If you don't want people calling you sweetie, maybe you shouldn't be spouting "loser" and "freak."

I mean, we have to even out the karma somehow.

Well it's certainly better than darling.

And yes, I've been called that before.

You know, instead of "loser" you should try something creative like "the economy" or "philosophy majors." It basically means the same thing.

kappa

>smite player

Progress.

But, dude.

HoTS players.

But being too direct lacks subtlety. If you're clever with your insults, you can have a variety of effects. You can prove your intellectual superiority with wit, or defuse a situation with an insult intended to be more amusing than actually offensive. While direct, loser is just so lame it insults you as much as it does them. You can do better.
its not about the insults its about sending a message. which i did
Nice exaggeration. also you dodged a bullet there is nothing fun about that champion anymore with every champion now having 7 forms of cc extreme mobility and the nerfs he got.
I like playing fiddle, I'm still in the queue to be picked up for jungle fiddle, 53 minutes and counting =/

I've seen the queue times for some champs.

It's *not* an exaggeration.

The only "tion" is that guy's assumption.
well i dont think hecarim top is that strong in the meta and it takes only like 5 mins on days when a lot of people seem to be on

Really?

People have picked up my mid AP Janna. 

Man, people must be fucking picky.
Idk anymore man, Idk
I really like the people who bitch and complain and say meta is everything. I play more and win more off-meta than I do while paying attention to meta...
I played Ashe support in team builder today and no one complained. Didn't go too well tho :P

Can you justifiably get mad at people for not wanting a jungle Fiddlesticks? 

Rather than getting mad at people, why not just say "well, I am trying to play something that's not too popular, maybe i need to try blind/draft pick if I want to play Fiddle".
I play fiddles alot, hes my favorite champ. This has happened to me a few times but most of the time people don't care they just want a jungler. Besides support its the worst position to try to find

What time of day was it? I bet the queue was just empty, Jungler's generally are high demand in teambuilder and it doesn't even matter who the heck they are. Honestly, the most oddball things I've queued for usually take at most a half an hour. I'm talking about me starting a party as solo heimer bot, and queuing for a mid, top, and two jungles. Which I've done repeatedly... and had many awesome games from it as a result.

But as far as solo queueing goes, I mean heck, I've queued for quinn jungle, leona jungle, vayne jungle, draven jungle. People usually don't seem to give a crap. I'm in a game in 10 minutes tops, if not less than a minute.
I've actually been getting games today as Top Lane Tank Braum in < 2 minutes, so I guess it all just depends on the day. :/
Make your own team, pretty simple. It's what I do if I want to play Mid.
